meanings.sent1: She prepays for her groceries online before picking them up.
meanings.sent2: He always prepays for his movie tickets to avoid waiting in line.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel prepays for its acorns by collecting them early in the season.
meanings.sent4: The diligent student prepays for success by studying ahead of time.
meanings.sent5: The responsible tenant prepays the rent to ensure no late payments.

meanings.definition: To pay for something before it is due.
meanings.sent1: They prepays their bills at the beginning of the month to stay organized.
meanings.sent2: The company prepays the suppliers to maintain good relationships.
meanings.sent3: The cat prepays for its nap by finding a cozy spot in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The early bird prepays for the worm by waking up before dawn.
meanings.sent5: The wise customer prepays for the service to enjoy a hassle-free experience.
